title: Small Group Exercise - Doing UNumber arithmetic with different sized operands

quizDescription.text:
Purpose of the day
The purpose of this exercise is to explore the impact of the size of operands on the size of the result when doing calculations with the UNumber API.

attachment: 02 Small Group Exercise - Doing UNumber arithmetic with different sized operands.pdf

questions.questionText: Summarize the Small Group Exercise - Doing UNumber arithmetic with different sized operands
